channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8319265] TestLoadLibraryDeadlock.java fails on windows-x64 "Unable to load b.jar"
item.description:
java/lang/ClassLoader/loadLibraryDeadlock/TestLoadLibraryDeadlock.java fails on windows-x64 with "Unable to load b.jar"

----------System.out:(36/6105)*----------

item.summary: TestLoadLibraryDeadlock.java fails on windows-x64 "Unable to load b.jar"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/434
Date: 2024-04-02 08:26:16 +0000

Fix request [21u]

I backport this for parity with 21.0.4-oracle. Included in backport of 8317965
No risk, only a test change.
Two clean backports, marked clean.
Test passes.
SAP nightly testing passed.

Changeset: 6ad093ef
Author: Mandy Chung <mchung@openjdk.org>
Date: 2023-11-02 16:38:30 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/6ad093ef12ccb2ee2c3da93f43dc1780f4bcf1c8

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/16466
Date: 2023-11-02 01:00:38 +0000

It's caused by JDK-8317965.

The test fails on windows because unmatched comparison of Path.toString() vs URL.getPath().toString().
